Text: The Losers and its attempt at cinavia protection has become a real pain in the ass! If i new the latest firmware update enables this on the ps3 i wouldn't have updated! Come on PT find a fix you are the encoding genius! Thanx in advance
Thanks for the up PT!nGreat quality!nNice job m8!

Hi thanks for the u/l and I too had the same issue as critic_101 with the ps3 as when I played the Losers the quality was  amazing but Cinavia kept blocking the sound every few mins damn those people what can we do? Is there another blu ray rip for the Ps3 that works without sound issues relating to Cinavia? Any help much appreciated thanks
